abstract: Goldman Sachs directors, who were already among the best-compensated corporate directors in the country, will receive an additional 500 shares a year, according to a securities filing.
snippet: Goldman Sachs directors, who were already among the best-compensated corporate directors in the country, will receive an additional 500 shares a year, according to a securities filing.
lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs directors are getting a pay raise.

headline.main: Goldman Raises Directors’ Pay by 500 Shares
headline.print_headline: Goldman Raises Directors’ Pay by 500 Shares
